text: The Cheonan Football Center Stadium () is a football-specific stadium and training ground in Cheonan, South Korea. The stadium holds 15,500 spectators. It was built in 2009. Currently it is the home of National League side Cheonan City FC. ==External links== Category:Football venues in South Korea Category:Sports venues in South Gyeongsang Province Category:Sports venues completed in 2009
title: Cheonan Football Center
